item.title: About Benjamin Dalton
item.description:
About Benjamin Dalton

Welcome to the Law Office of Benjamin Dalton. We specialize in commercial real estate and commercial law. As both a real estate attorney and real estate agent, Mr. Dalton helpsÂ  clients with acquiring and selling commercial real estate as well as with commercial leasing and negotiations. Having both the knowledge of the law and the market, Mr. Dalton is able to leverage both to the benefit of his clients.
